policy.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:SslAssertion>
                <L7p:RequireClientAuthentication booleanValue="true"/>
            </L7p:SslAssertion>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SslAssertion/>
                <L7p:HttpBasic/>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="~ enforce security checks"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>
            <L7p:Content stringValue="${error_description}"/>
            <L7p:ExtraHeaders nameValuePairArray="included"/>
        </L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:Authentication>
                <L7p:IdentityProviderOid goidValue="0000000000000000fffffffffffffffe"/>
            </L7p:Authentication>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="QXV0aGVudGljYXRpb24gZmFpbGVkLg=="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error_description"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="~ enforce authz"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="RXJyb3IgZW5jb3VudGVyZWQgaW4gcHJvY2Vzc2luZyB0aGUgcmVxdWVzdC4gUGxlYXNlIGNoZWNrIHRoZSBTU0cgYXVkaXRzL2xvZ3MvYWRtaW5pc3RyYXRvciBmb3IgbW9yZSBpbmZvcm1hdGlvbiBhYm91dCB0aGUgcHJvYmxlbS4="/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error_description"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>
            <L7p:Content stringValueReference="inline"><![CDATA[{
"errors": [
    {
        "message": "${error_description}"
    }
]
}]]></L7p:Content>
            <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=UTF-8"/>
            <L7p:ExtraHeaders nameValuePairArray="included"/>
            <L7p:HttpStatus stringValue="200"/>
        </L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                <L7p:Expression stringValue="$.query"/>
                <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="graphqlQuery"/>
            </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="RXJyb3IgZW5jb3VudGVyZWQgaW4gcGFyc2luZyB0aGUgSlNPTiByZXF1ZXN0Lg=="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error_description"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="extract query"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                <L7p:Expression stringValue="$.variables"/>
                <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="graphqlVars"/>
            </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
            <L7p:TrueAssertion/>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="extract variables"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:GatewayGraphQL>
            <L7p:Query stringValue="${graphqlQuery.result}"/>
            <L7p:Variables stringValue="${graphqlVars.result}"/>
        </L7p:GatewayGraphQL>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:SslAssertion>
                <L7p:RequireClientAuthentication booleanValue="true"/>
            </L7p:SslAssertion>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SslAssertion/>
                <L7p:HttpBasic/>
            </wsp:All>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:Authentication>
            <L7p:IdentityProviderOid goidValue="0000000000000000fffffffffffffffe"/>
        </L7p:Authentication>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="Check the request message size. If the maximum message size needs to be increased change the 'restman.request.message.maxSize' cluster property"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:RequestSizeLimit>
                <L7p:Limit stringValue="${gateway.restman.request.message.maxSize}"/>
            </L7p:RequestSizeLimit>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>
                    <L7p:Content stringValueReference="inline"><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<l7:Error xmlns:l7="http://ns.l7tech.com/2010/04/gateway-management">
    <l7:Type>InvalidRequest</l7:Type>
    <l7:Detail>the specified maximum data size limit would be exceeded</l7:Detail>
</l7:Error>]]></L7p:Content>
                    <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/xml; charset=UTF-8"/>
                    <L7p:HttpStatus stringValue="400"/>
                </L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>
                <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
            </wsp:All>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:RESTGatewayManagement/>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="************************************************************"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="API :- Layer7 Operator UseCase - GW Info"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="API Group :- REST Encryption"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="API TYPE :- REST"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Author: Balaji Radhakrishnan"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="************************************************************"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MjAw"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="RespCode"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="eyAiRXhjZXB0aW9uIjogIkF1dGhlbnRpY2F0aW9uIEZhaWxlZCIsDQogICJEZXNjcmlwdGlvbiI6ICJVc2VyIG5vdCBmb3VuZCwgcGxlYXNlIGNoZWNrIHJlLXRyeS4iIH0="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="Error"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
        </wsp:All>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SslAssertion/>
                <L7p:HttpBasic/>
                <L7p:Authentication>
                    <L7p:IdentityProviderOid goidValue="0000000000000000fffffffffffffffe"/>
                </L7p:Authentication>
                <L7p:HardcodedResponse>
                    <L7p:Base64ResponseBody stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:ResponseContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=UTF-8"/>
                </L7p:HardcodedResponse>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="NDAx"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="RespCode"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="eyAiRXhjZXB0aW9uIjogIkF1dGhlbnRpY2F0aW9uIEZhaWxlZCIsDQogICJEZXNjcmlwdGlvbiI6ICJVc2VyIG5vdCBmb3VuZCwgcGxlYXNlIGNoZWNrIHJlLXRyeS4iIH0="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="Error"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>
                    <L7p:Content stringValue="${Error}"/>
                    <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=UTF-8"/>
                    <L7p:ExtraHeaders nameValuePairArray="included">
                        <L7p:item nameValuePair="included">
                            <L7p:Key stringValue="l7-resp-code"/>
                            <L7p:Value stringValue="${RespCode}"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:ExtraHeaders>
                    <L7p:HttpStatus stringValue="${RespCode}"/>
                    <L7p:IncludePolicyDownloadURL booleanValue="true"/>
                </L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>
                <L7p:RaiseError/>
            </wsp:All>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
